scripts.start:api: cd pythonHandler && source venv/bin/activate && export FLASK_APP=main && export FLASK_ENV=development && python -m flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5003

scripts.test: Runs the full test suite with a fixed test user (creates and cleans up the test user automatically)
scripts.test:all: Alias for 'test' - runs both training and categorization tests
scripts.test:train: Runs only the training test (skips training)
scripts.test:cat: Runs only the categorization test (skips training)
scripts.debug-test: Runs the tests with Node.js inspector enabled for debugging
scripts.start:api: Starts the Flask API server on port 5003
